quotes.text: Every day is a good day, if you want it to be.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's build a happy little cloud that floats around the sky.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: There's nothing wrong with having a tree as a friend.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's put some happy little trees in our world.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: We want happy paintings. Happy paintings. If you want sad things, watch the news.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: It's so important to do something every day that will make you happy.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's get crazy today.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: We don't really know where this goes, and I'm not sure we really care.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's make some happy little clouds that just float around and have a good time.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: I think there's an artist hidden at the bottom of every single one of us.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's put a little tree here. Happy little tree.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's build some happy little clouds up here.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's put some happy little bushes here.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Talent is a pursued interest. Anything that you're willing to practice, you can do.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: You can do anything you want. This is your world.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Just go out and talk to a tree. Make friends with it.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: You need the dark in order to show the light.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's build a happy little cloud. Let's build some happy little trees.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: I believe talent is just a pursued interest.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: This is your world. You're the creator. Find freedom on this canvas.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: There's nothing in the world that breeds success like success.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Don't forget to tell these special people in your life just how special they are to you.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: You can do it. I know you can.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: We want to use a lot of pressure to apply the color, and just whisper-light touch to blend it.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's get crazy.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Maybe there's a happy little waterfall hiding in that mist.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Isn't it fantastic that you can change your mind and create all these happy things?
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Use absolutely no pressure. Just like an angel's wing.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Let's put a few little highlights in here just to make them little rascals sparkle in the sun.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: I think each of us, sometime in our life, has wanted to paint a picture.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: You too can paint almighty pictures.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: In painting, you have unlimited power. You have the ability to move mountains.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Just let your imagination take you wherever it wants to go.
quotes.author: Bob Ross
